Title: Provides protection to employees and former employees from retaliatory actions by employers for the reporting of illegal or dangerous business activities
Summary: Provides protection to employees and former employees from retaliatory actions by employers for the reporting of illegal or dangerous business activities.
LawCode: Amd ยง740, Lab L; amd ยง75-b, Civ Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the labor law and the civil service law, in relation to protection of employees and former employees against retaliatory action by employers
